item.title: Rune rocks (dodian)

item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

idk if this will work for dodian try this add this void[code]//public void StartMining(int Lvl, int XP, int OreID, int MinPick, int Delay)

			if(objectID == 2091) {
				StartMining(1, 20, 436, 1, 20);
			}
			if(objectID == 2094) {
				StartMining(1, 20, 438, 1, 20);
			}
			if(objectID == 2093) {
				StartMining(15, 35, 440, 2, 25);
			}
			if(objectID == 2097) {
				StartMining(30, 45, 453, 3, 30);
			}
			if(objectID == 2103) {
				StartMining(55, 65, 447, 4, 40);
			}
			if(objectID == 2105) {
				StartMining(75, 73, 449, 5, 60);
			}
			if(objectID == 2107) {
				StartMining(85, 81, 451, 6, 90);
			}
			if(objectID == 3403) {
				StartMining(93, 95, 2892, 6, 130);
			}
			if(objectID == 2099) {
				StartMining(40, 50, 444, 3, 60);
			}
			if(objectID == 2100) {
				StartMining(22, 50, 438, 2, 30);
			}
			if(objectID == 11666) {
				sendFrame164(2400);
			}[/code]
